com.diegokrupitza.microcompiler.datastructures

Class StorageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diegokrupitza.microcompiler.datastructures.StorageHandler

  • public class StorageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is here for the management of registers and memory. Furthermore, the variables are registered here and stored in the memory. Any register or memory related activities can be found here.

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Diego Krupitza

      • getFirstFreeMemoryAddress

        private static int getFirstFreeMemoryAddress()
        Searches for the first free memory and registers it If there is no than you get the min value of Integer
        Returns:
        the index of the memory address. If there is no free memory address the return value is Integer.MIN_VALUE

      • getVariableLocation

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String getVariableLocation(java.lang.String variableName)
                                                 throws VariableException,
                                                        GeneratorException
        Deprecated. change to correct return TODO: deprecated just to know that this had to be changes as soon as possible
        Gets the locations in a register or in memory of a given variable
        Parameters:
        variableName - the name of the variable
        Returns:
        the location of that variable
        Throws:
        VariableException - in case the variable is not existing
        GeneratorException - the generator exception

      • reserveRegister

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> reserveRegister()
        Reserves a slot for a register. If there is no register available there is a null object in the Optional
        Returns:
        the name of the reserved register

      • getRegisterName

        public java.lang.String getRegisterName(int registerId)
        Generates the name for a given registerId
        Parameters:
        registerId - the id of the register
        Returns:
        the name of that register as a String

      • getFirstFreeRegister

        private int getFirstFreeRegister()
        Searches for the first free register and registers it If there is no than you get the min value of Integer
        Returns:
        the index of the register. If there is no free register the return value is Integer.MIN_VALUE

      • freeUpRegister

        public OutsourcedRegister freeUpRegister()
                                  throws MemoryException,
                                         GeneratorException
        Generates the instructions to free up a register. It outsources the oldest not used register into the memory
        Returns:
        an OutsourcedRegister object that contains the name of the free Register and the instructions to outsource the old one
        Throws:
        MemoryException - in case there are no more memory addresses free
        GeneratorException - the generator exception

      • moveIntoMemory

        public java.lang.String moveIntoMemory(java.lang.String registerName,
                                       int memAddress)
                                throws GeneratorException
        Moves the value from one register into the memory at a certain address
        Parameters:
        registerName - the register to move in
        memAddress - the address where to store the value from the register
        Returns:
        the instructions to move the value from a register into the memAddress memory address
        Throws:
        GeneratorException - thrown in case the memAddress cannot be generated

      • moveIntoRegister

        public java.lang.String moveIntoRegister(java.lang.String registerName,
                                         int memAddress)
                                  throws GeneratorException
        Moves a value stored in the memory at the address memAddress into the register registerName
        Parameters:
        registerName - the name of the register in the format "R[registerId]"
        memAddress - the address of the values in the memory
        Returns:
        the instruction to move the value from the memAddress into the given register
        Throws:
        GeneratorException - thrown in case the memAddress cannot be generated

      • getOldestNotUsedVariable

        private Variable getOldestNotUsedVariable()
        Gets the oldest not used variable that is not the the memory.
        Returns:
        the oldest not used variable

      • convertToMemoryAddress

        private int convertToMemoryAddress(int addressId)
        Converts the id of the MEMORY_USE array into a memory address that can be use in the Micro16
        Parameters:
        addressId - the id of that memory address in the MEMORY_USE array
        Returns:
        the calculated Memory address to use in a Micro16, in case that there is an invalid memory address generated the return value is Integer.MIN_VALUE
